statements: SELECT * FROM accommodations WHERE accommodation_type = 'Dormitory' ORDER BY accommodation_date DESC;
SELECT accommodation_id, student_id, accommodation_type FROM accommodations WHERE student_id = 12345;
SELECT accommodation_description FROM accommodations WHERE accommodation_type = 'Apartment' AND accommodation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM accommodations WHERE accommodation_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY accommodation_id;
SELECT student_id, accommodation_type FROM accommodations WHERE accommodation_date BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT accommodation_id, student_id, accommodation_type, accommodation_description, accommodation_date FROM accommodations WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT accommodation_id, accommodation_type, accommodation_description FROM accommodations WHERE accommodation_type = 'Dormitory';
SELECT * FROM accommodations WHERE accommodation_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY accommodation_date DESC;
SELECT accommodation_id, accommodation_type, accommodation_date FROM accommodations WHERE accommodation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND accommodation_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY accommodation_date ASC;

SELECT accommodation_description, accommodation_type, student_id FROM accommodations WHERE accommodation_description LIKE '%quiet%' OR accommodation_description LIKE '%spacious%' ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Accommodations;
SELECT accommodation_type, description FROM Accommodations WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Accommodations WHERE accommodation_type = 'Wheelchair Accessible';
SELECT * FROM Modifications ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT id, student_id, modification_type FROM Modifications WHERE student_id = 3 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Accommodations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT accommodation_type, description FROM Accommodations WHERE student_id = 123 ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT * FROM Accommodations INNER JOIN Modifications ON Accommodations.student_id = Modifications.student_id;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(id) AS total_modifications FROM Modifications GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_modifications > 2;
SELECT accommodation_type, description FROM Accommodations WHERE date_created >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT name, grade FROM Students WHERE grade > 10;
SELECT id, name FROM Accommodations ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT student_id, modification_type FROM Modifications WHERE modification_type = 'Extra Time';
SELECT id, name, dob FROM Students WHERE dob < '2005-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE grade > 10;
SELECT * FROM Accommodations WHERE accommodation_type = 'Extended Time';
SELECT * FROM Modifications WHERE description LIKE '%quiz%';
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Accommodations JOIN Students ON Accommodations.student_id = Students.id;
SELECT * FROM documentation_accommodations;
SELECT accommodation_id, accommodation_description, date_created FROM documentation_accommodations;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM student_information;
SELECT student_id, modification_type FROM student_modifications;
SELECT * FROM accommodation_history;
SELECT * FROM documentation_accommodations
SELECT accommodation_id, student_id, accommodation_description FROM documentation_accommodations WHERE student_id = 123
SELECT accommodation_id, accommodation_description, date_created FROM documentation_accommodations ORDER BY date_created DESC

SELECT accommodation_id, student_name, student_grade, student_gender FROM documentation_accommodations INNER JOIN student_information ON documentation_accommodations.student_id = student_information.student_id
SELECT * FROM documentation_accommodations INNER JOIN accommodation_history ON documentation_accommodations.accommodation_id = accommodation_history.accommodation_id
SELECT * FROM accommodations;
SELECT accommodation_id, accommodation_description FROM accommodations WHERE accommodation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_gender = 'female';
SELECT teacher_name FROM teachers WHERE teacher_department = 'Science';
SELECT * FROM accommodation_history ORDER BY history_date DESC, history_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM accommodations;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_gender='Male';
SELECT teacher_name, teacher_department FROM teachers ORDER BY teacher_name DESC;
SELECT modification_description FROM modifications WHERE modification_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT accommodation_date, accommodation_description FROM accommodations WHERE student_id = 3;
